comments.body: Can we please add a comment here explaining why this is important?

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +101,105 @@        # broker, and that coordinator will fail the consumer and trigger a group rebalance if its session times out.
        # This test is asserting that no rebalances occur, so we increase the session timeout for this to be the case.
        self.session_timeout_sec = 30
        consumer = self.setup_consumer(self.TOPIC)
